meanings.definition: Relating to or having the effects of progestogen.
meanings.sent1: The progestogenic medication helped regulate her menstrual cycle.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed a progestogenic treatment to support pregnancy.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her progestogenic powers made her the queen of hormonal balance.
meanings.sent4: The progestogenic influence of the medication was like a gentle wave calming her body.
meanings.sent5: The progestogenic nature of the herb was as soothing as a warm blanket on a cold night.

meanings.sent1: The progestogenic effects of the herb were beneficial for her health.
meanings.sent2: The progestogenic properties of the plant extract were well-studied.
meanings.sent3: He playfully claimed his progestogenic abilities made him the superhero of hormone regulation.
meanings.sent4: The progestogenic impact of the supplement was like a protective shield for her body.
meanings.sent5: The progestogenic characteristics of the medication were as reliable as a loyal friend.
